data.name: File Input
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    {{#if (eq type "file")}}
    <from uri="{{type}}:{{directory}}{{querystring file_query_params extra_query_params}}"/>
    {{/if}}
    {{#if (eq type "file-watch")}}
    <from uri="{{type}}:{{directory}}{{querystring file_watch_query_params extra_query_params}}"/>
    {{/if}}
    {{#if (eq type "aws-s3")}}
    <from uri="{{type}}:{{directory}}{{querystring extra_query_params}}"/>
    {{/if}}
    {{applyUnmarshal output_format output_format_options}} 
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
